frame.name: Aggressive Frame
frame.description: Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

perks.description:
Ranged shotgun barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Greatly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Rifled Barrel

perks.description: Smooth shotgun barrel. Greatly increases range at the cost of more projectile spread.
perks.name: Smoothbore

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
Balanced shotgun barrel.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Barrel Shroud

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description: Tightened barrel. Reduces projectile spread when aiming down sights at the cost of precision damage.
perks.name: Full Choke

perks.description:
This shotgun's magazine is optimized for quick combat.
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Increases rate of fire
perks.name: Assault Mag

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size
perks.name: Tactical Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description:
This magazine is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Greatly increases stability 
  •  Slightly decreases range
perks.name: Steady Rounds

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Light Mag

perks.description: Reloads two shells at a time, but reduces reload speed.
perks.name: Dual Loader

perks.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Subsistence

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Reloads three shells at a time, but reduces reload speed.
perks.name: Dual Loader

perks.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves with an increased amount of ammo.
perks.name: Subsistence

perks.description: Improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion

perks.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.
perks.name: Steady Hands

perks.description: Substantially improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion for a short duration.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion Enhanced

perks.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a longer duration.
perks.name: Steady Hands

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Hitting an enemy with every pellet in a shot increases melee damage for a short duration.
perks.name: One-Two Punch

perks.description: Defeating combatants with this weapon generates an improved small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Hitting a target with nearly every pellet in a shot increases melee damage for a short duration.
perks.name: One-Two Punch

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description:
Increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
perks.name: Elemental Capacitor

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon for an improved duration until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description:
Substantially increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
perks.name: Elemental Capacitor

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon for an improved duration.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description: This weapon deals increased damage against vehicles, turrets, barricades, and Stasis crystals.
perks.name: Hakke Breach Armaments
